verbose_text: T0 treatment leads to decreases in chromatin accessibility at targets of LXR repression, such as Il1b (XREF_FIG), and moderate increases in chromatin accessibility at LXR targets, such as Srebf1 (XREF_FIG).
evidence: LXR repression, such as Il1b ( XREF_FIG ), and moderate increases in chromatin accessibility at LXR targets, such as Srebf1
